mapper.select: SELECT video_id AS videoId FROM videos WHERE video_url LIKE CONCAT('%',#{videoUrl},'%')
SELECT video_cluster_id AS videoClusterId FROM videos WHERE video_url LIKE CONCAT('%',#{videoUrl},'%')

SELECT video_id AS videoId, video_title AS videoTitle, video_tags AS videoTags, video_url AS videoUrl, video_views AS videoViews, video_duration AS videoDuration, video_cover_image AS videoCoverImage FROM videos WHERE FIND_IN_SET(#{clusterId}, video_cluster_id) AND (#{videoUrl} is NULL OR video_url NOT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{videoUrl},'%')) ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT #{limit}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM view_history WHERE video_id = #{videoId} AND date = #{date}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM like_history WHERE video_id = #{videoId} AND date = #{date}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO view_history (user_id, video_id, date) VALUES (#{userId}, #{videoId}, #{date})
INSERT INTO like_history (user_id, video_id, date) VALUES (#{userId}, #{videoId}, #{date})
